text: hi I'm Pete from James fruiting and
today I'm going to show you how to make
a simple jam jar dressing with this
pallet vinegar and this extra virgin
olive oil right I've got myself a little
jam jar here just any old jam jar as
long as it's clean I'm going to make a
little dressing in it from my mix salad
first thing pinch of salt pinch of
pepper and when I take some balsamic
vinegar and add a splash now you don't
need to be too exact with this because
all you do is look at how much vinegar
you've added and add about three times
as much oil until it's about about three
times as much oil as Louise vinegar the
next thing to do click the top on make
sure you fasten it good and tight and
then you just shake it to mix okay
that's all nice and mixed your dressings
ready to go so here's my mix salad just
going to open my dressing up pour a
little bit on and give it little toss
with your hands and there you are that's
your nice mix salad or balsamic vinegar
and olive oil dressing
you
